title: Video Review: Epson Perfection V39 Scanner
description:
I wanted to scan some of my old pictures, so I needed a scanner for that purpose within $70-80. Epson Perfection V39 met my expectations, although I would have preferred faster scanning speed. 
Here is where I got it from: http://amzn.to/2ldtqcQ
